course_description: This course focuses on care for clients experiencing complex and critical situations. The pathophysiologic basis of hemodynamic and cardiopulmonary instability, respiratory failure, and shock states will be explored.
prerequisites: NRSG 326 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3945, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 2-3:50p, Instructor: Garbett/Woods, Status: Open
